docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is stable and recommended for use. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or using api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: List default templates combinations for an operating system

examples:
GET /api/operatingsystems/1073012828/os_default_templates
